word: H2100 - זוּב - zûwb - zoob - Flow - பெருகு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - புறப்படு, கரைந்துபோ, ஓடு, பிரமியமுள்ளவனாயிரு, விலகியிரு, ஓடிவா, ஆதகம், விலக்கம், தீட்டு
to flow, to gush, to issue, to discharge (Qal)
3) to flow (of issue from woman), to have an issue (a flux)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to flow freely (as water), that is, (specifically) to have a (sexual) flux; figuratively to waste away; also to overflow: - flow, gush out, have a (running) issue, pine away, run.
Cognate: H2100, H2101
